title: Get six bottles of Kylie’s Signature Wine for under £50!
content:
Wine Delivered was named by Harper’s Bazaar in November 2020 as the number one wine delivery service in the UK. With wines sourced from popular countries and regions such as New Zealand, Australia, France and Argentina, brands in the portfolio include Kylie Minogue Wines, listing her premium series exclusively, Graham Norton’s Own, Howard Park Wines, Invite x SJP Wines, Chateau Sainte Roseline, Sir Ian Botham Wines, and Mad Fish. And now, you can do the family summer barbecue right with a case of three bottles each of Kylie Minogue’s Signature Merlot and Sauvignon Blanc for just £49.99 when you use the code SUMMERDEAL at checkout.

Claim your discount

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

This fantastic mixed case of wine is the perfect way to celebrate summer, and a bargain too at just £49.99. The mixed case includes three bottles of Kylie Minogue Merlot and three bottles of Kylie Minogue Sauvignon Blanc, with free next day delivery.

Want to access even more wine deals? You can access all of our exclusive deals with WineDelivered here.

Claim your discount

Offer ends 30/09/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

You can find all our current shopping deals here. If you have any questions about the deal product or the related services, please contact the provider directly. If you have any questions about the online shopping deal itself, or if you would like to work with us as a partner, please email deals@bikeradar.com
author: Steve Newell
